# RISO Construction Inspection Services, PEI

## Solicitation Details

- **Solicitation Title (English)**: RISO Construction Inspection Services, PEI
- **Solicitation Title (French)**: OCIR Services d'inspection de la construction, Î.-P.-É.
- **Solicitation Reference**: WS4084229700
- **Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, July 26, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Duration**: From date of award to March 31st, 2025, with one (1) Optional Year

## Procurement Details

- **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Standing Offer
- **Notice Type (French)**: Demande d’offre à commandes
- **Procurement Category**: SRV
- **Method of Procurement**: Competitive (Open Bidding)
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Regional Areas of Opportunity**: Prince Edward Island

## Project Description  
The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, is seeking a qualified contractor to provide regional individual standing offer (RISO) for construction inspection services at various locations in Prince Edward Island. This RISO will support inspection services for marine and land-based projects.

## Requirements
The Contractor must have personnel with expertise in the following areas:
- Electrical inspection services (UNS 72151515)
- Material or product inspection (UNS 81141503)
- Building inspection services (UNS 81141805)
- Plumbing or sewer inspection services (UNS 81141807)

## Additional Information
The period of the Standing Offer will run for one year from the date of the award and may be extended for another year upon mutual agreement. Interested contractors should refer to the solicitation document for further details. 

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name (English)**: Sonia Stockman
- **Contact Email (English)**: sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
